alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 06 at 2:22PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...LIGHT SNOW TO AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN NORTH DAKOTA AND WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA TONIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY MORNING... A quick moving system will bring another round of accumulating snow to portions of southeastern North Dakota and west central Minnesota. New snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches will be possible along and south of the Interstate 94 and Highway 10 corridors. Locally higher amounts up to 5 inches will also be possible, but uncertainty in the location of heaviest snowfall remains. This new snowfall will impact the morning commute, so if traveling Wednesday morning, allow extra time to reach your destination. Check road conditions... By Phone: call 511 Website for North Dakota: travel.dot.nd.gov Website for Minnesota: 511mn.org
